name: Winter // Community Supported Herbalism Share
description:
direction North // element Water // organ Kidneys // color Indigo // emotion Fear // taste Salty

Our Winter CSH Share is now available for preorder! 

*If additional items are ordered with the Winter Share they will be shipped out the week of December 16th with the Share. Please purchase extra remedies separately if you would like to receive them earlier than that. If you are purchasing this Share as a gift let us know if you would like us to include a small note or card. 

We are still finalizing all the recipes so things might change a wee bit but that is just part of the fun!

+Herbal Chai with Astragalus, Burdock & Roasted Dandelion. A traditional Chai with additional herbs to boost your immune system and help your liver process some of those extra indulgences. Caffeine free.
 
+Sore Throat Spray. Relief from one of winter's common ailments with Redroot & Licorice leading the way. Potent anti-viral Echinacea is added to support the immune system.

+Herbal Gomasio. Black Sesame Seeds nourish the Kidneys and were our inspiration for this nutritive condiment. We added Milk Thistle seeds to help your liver process all the rich foods of winter. A great salt alternative, this Gomasio also has Nettles and Nori to provide mineral rich properties to each meal. 
 
+Cardamon &  Fennel Bitters. Jump start your digestive process and help it along! Bitters also help digest fats and will help with the holiday feasting. Also delicious in sparkling mineral water or cocktails.

+Winter Solstice Mister for Bringing in the Light. Citrus inspired aromatics to help stave off the grey winter days and lift your spirit. 

+ Spruce & Blood Orange Soap. Traditional cold process soap with calendula infused olive oil to soothe the skin.

+Winter Forest Salt Soak. Sink into a bath with the scent of the ancient forests of the Pacific Northwest to help ease your stress away. Notes of Cedarwood & Fir essential oils in a blend of Pacific Sea Salts, Dead Sea Salt and Epsom Salt to soothe and relax tired muscles.

+Damiana & Rose Elixir. Known for its aphrodisiac properties we blended Damiana with rose petals and the warming spices Ginger and Cinnamon. Infused in Brandy and Honey this elixir is as beneficial as it is delicious! We like a teaspoon or two on cold winter nights to keep us warm.

All of our Shares will have detailed information on how and when to use our medicinals, as well as how to achieve optimal seasonal healthcare.

A few housekeeping notes- Please read!

>>>Winter CSH Shares will ship the week of December 16th, and the local pick up with be on Friday evening, December 20th.

>>>If you are in Portland and plan on picking up your share at our local pick up enter the code LOCAL to avoid shipping costs. The pick up will be Friday evening, December 20th. If you know you cannot make this date please do have it shipped!

Disclaimer: In purchasing this CSH share you do so understanding that the information provided in this share is for informational purposes only and is not intended as a substitute for advice from your physician or other health care professional. You should not use the information in this CSH share for self-diagnosis or to replace any prescriptive medication. You should consult with a health care professional before starting any diet, exercise or supplementation program, before taking any medication, or if you have or suspect you might have a health problem, suffer from allergies, are pregnant or nursing. 

Thank you for supporting Portland Apothecary and Community Supported Herbalism!

name: Winter // Community Supported Herbalism // Half Share
description:
We are offering a limited quantity half share option for this season's Community Supported Herbalism (CSH) Share. The half share is stripped down to medicinal essentials for preventative health care during Winter.  Half Shares are available now for preorder but will be shipped or available for local pick up around the Winter Solstice.

*If additional items are ordered with the Winter Half Share they will be shipped out the week of December 16th with the Share. Please purchase extra remedies separately if you would like to receive them earlier than that.

We are still finalizing all the recipes so things might change a wee bit but that is just part of the fun!

+Herbal Chai with Astragalus, Burdock & Roasted Dandelion. A traditional Chai with additional herbs to boost your immune system and help your liver process some of those extra indulgences. Caffeine free.
 
+Sore Throat Spray. Relief from one of winter's common ailments with Redroot & Licorice leading the way. Potent anti-viral Echinacea is added to support the immune system.

+Winter Solstice Mister for Bringing in the Light. Citrus inspired aromatics to help stave off the grey winter days and lift your spirit. 

+Herbal Gomasio. Black Sesame Seeds nourish the Kidneys and were our inspiration for this nutritive condiment. We added Milk Thistle seeds to help your liver process all the rich foods of winter. A great salt alternative, this Gomasio also has Nettles and Nori to provide mineral rich properties to each meal. 

Each half share will come with our Winter Notes which include sound advice for how to best transition with the seasons, including the physical, emotional and spiritual realms. We will also include more lengthy notes on each remedy and their indications of use. 

Unfortunately at this time we are unable to offer substitutions from the full share, the remedies in this half share have been carefully thought out and we think you'll enjoy them. 

A few housekeeping notes- Please read!

*Winter CSH Shares will ship the week of December 16th, and the Local pick up with be on Friday, December 20th. 

>>>If you are in Portland and plan on picking up your share at our local pick up enter the code LOCAL to avoid shipping costs. The pick up will be Friday evening, December 20th. If you know you cannot make this date please do have it shipped!

>>>Disclaimer: In purchasing this CSM share you do so understanding that the information provided in this share is for informational purposes only and is not intended as a substitute for advice from your physician or other health care professional. You should not use the information in this CSM share for self-diagnosis or to replace any prescriptive medication. You should consult with a health care professional before starting any diet, exercise or supplementation program, before taking any medication, or if you have or suspect you might have a health problem, suffer from allergies, are pregnant or nursing.

name: Ritual Misters
description:
Our travel size ritual misters are a perfect way to help set intentions. Each mister is a specific blend of aromatherapeutic  essential oils and handmade flower and gem essences meant to transform your space and mood. Choose from the following elements line. 2oz glass bottle. 

S E A 
For Renewal + Invigoration + Clarity
A blend of Bay, Eucalyptus and Lemongrass essential oils. Fennel flower essence is added to help in your ability to see with more clarity that which no longer serves your highest good.


M O U N T A I N  
For Protection + Strength + Mystery
A blend of Juniper, Spruce and Myrrh essential oils. Know as the Warrior's herb Yarrow flower essence is added to provide energetic protection.


D E S E R T  
For Calm + Resilience + Love
A blend of Sage, Ylang Ylang and Lavender essential oils. Pure heart medicine,  Rose Quartz gem essence is added to help your heart heal and stay open to love. 


F O R E S T 
For Grounding + Manifestation + Growth
A blend of Cedarwood, Fir and Vetiver essential oils. Blackberry flower essence is added to help ground your ideas into reality. It will give you the energetic push you need to manifest your will into action, especially helpful when visualizing next steps and finding your voice.

name: Chai with Roasted Dandelion, Burdock & Astragalus
description: Our chai is spicy and robust with a full bodied Rooibos base. We love Chai for the warmth, the aroma and the little zing it gives you with just the right kick. We decided to create a twist on the traditional Chai of cardamom, cinnamon, anise, black pepper & ginger and added astragalus, burdock and dandelion. As you saw in our Autumn Share, Astragalus is an effective herb to integrate into your daily life in your soups, stews, rice and now your chai. Astragalus provides a nice steady support for your immune system. Burdock & Dandelion provide a little bitter flavor which makes it not only satisfying for you coffee lovers, but also helps jumpstart the digestive system as discussed above. In addition they both also provide support to your liver function.You can use 1 tsp to 1tbsp to a big cup of Chai according to taste. If you want a spicier brew add a few slices of freshly cut ginger. Now go put on a good record, or sit on the porch and maybe pull out a pen and paper and write a letter. This chai will help you focus and feel grounded. 8oz tin.

name: Nourish Tea
description: Drinking this tea is like drinking in Spring! Nettles, Oat Tops, Oatstraw, Lemon Balm , Red Clover Blossoms, Mint and Violet Leaves combine to offer a delicious green tasting tea with citrus overtones. When we picture this tea it is like standing in a field bursting with new growth after a long winter. The oats are swaying bent over with their heavy tops, the honeybees are stirring up the red clover and the violets demurely display themselves along the edges. A magical place. This tea is not only packed with minerals and nutrients of the new growth of spring plants, but it also nourishes your nervous system with the oats and lemon balm. As we talked about earlier in our Spring Notes, it’s quite easy to feel agitated during this season so we formulated this tea to keep you strong and healthy without the edge. If you want to get the maximum benefits of this tea and have it be truly medicinal it is best to do an infusion of over four hours. We like to add a small handful to a teapot and then cover with boiling water and let it steep overnight. In the morning you can strain it and reheat, enjoying 2 or 3 cups throughout the day. On the other hand you can also just it infuse it like normal for about 10 minutes and still enjoy a satisfying cup of tea.

name: Blossom Tea
description: Summer brings forth an explosion of blossoms, and we decided to put some of our favorites into a tea blend. Linden trees with their beautiful flowers and heart shaped leaves are the perfect base for this tea. Sipping on Linden tea has a long standing tradition to bring about a sense of ease and calm. Combined with lemon balm leaves it will put you into a relaxed state quickly! We added Mint, Hibiscus, Helichrysum, Chamomile and Rose Petals into this great tasting blend. The Hibiscus gives it a hint of a blush color once brewed. This tea is great as an infusion, but we also like it as a sun tea or an iced tea. 8oz tin.

name: Hyssop + Yarrow Tea
description: A blend of tasty and medicinal herbs to take when you feel a fever coming on or the beginnings of a cold. Perfect to take between getting out of a hot bath and getting under the covers. Hyssop, Yarrow and Elderflower are well known diaphoretics, helping to warm the body and push out coldness. Diaphotetics open your pores and make you sweat! We added some calendula petals for pure sunshine and to help you remember the warm months of summer. Mint makes the tea aromatic and refreshing, as some of the other herbs are quite bitter. Great tea to take at first signs of a fever, one cup, three times a day will do during these times. 8oz tin.

name: Harvest Tea
description: A tasty tea blend to celebrate the Harvest and bounty of the season. Full of berries and roots to help strengthen the body with hints of citrus and mint, a delicious tea to drink everyday! Harvest tea includes hibiscus, elderberries, rosehips, hawthorne berries, schizandra berries, marshmallow root, siberian ginseng, mint and orange peel. 8oz tin.

name: Elecampane Honey
description: This is such a special honey. The deep earthy taste of Elecampane root mixed with local Willamette Valley honey is amazingly delicious. It's also extremely effective at helping to clear up respiratory and bronchial ailments, especially those that are productive with mucus. You can eat the honey straight from the spoon or mix it into an herbal tea or hot water. 6oz glass jar.

name: Fir Tip Infused Sea Salt
description: If you walk through the forests here in late Spring the Firs are adorned with bright green new growth at their tips. The color and patterns are stunning and you can’t help but spend some time with the trees admiring them, and if you’re an herbalist, nibbling on the tips. The tips taste all at once like the deep forest and surprisingly like citrus, with a bright clean note. They’re high in Vitamin C and Vitamin A and make a really pleasant tea or infused olive oil. We decided to infuse Pacific Sea Salt with the tips and blend in some organic lemon zest to really bring out the citrus flavor in this blend. Great used as a finishing salt for all manner of dishes.

name: Cardamom + Fennel Digestive Bitters
description: Cardamom pods, Oregon grape root, bitter orange and fennel seeds round out this aromatic and tasty bitters recipe. Jump start your digestive process and help it along! Bitters also help digest fats and will help with the holiday feasting. Delicious in sparkling mineral water or cocktails. 1oz glass bottle with dropper.

name: Hawthorne Berry Elixir
description:
This elixir tastes so good it’s hard to believe that it’s medicinal! You can either take it straight by the spoonful or mix it into some tea. Traditionally Hawthorne has been revered for its capacity to strengthen and fortify the heart and the circulatory system of our bodies. It’s a tonic herb that is especially useful if there is a history of high blood pressure, heart disease or sluggish circulation that runs in your family. Schizandra berry is an adaptogenic herb that is well suited as a companion herb to Hawthorne. Adaptogenic herbs can also be taken for lengths of time to fortify your health and in essence work toward reversing any pathological state your body might be in regardless of the direction. For example, it can bring about heightened mental clarity and energy if you are fatigued, but it can also calm down your nervous system if you are suffering from anxiety. In Traditional Chinese Medicine this berry represents the five flavors: sour, bitter, sweet, acrid & salty.  We’ve also added a small amount of Motherwort extract to this mix. Motherwort is sometimes referred to as ‘Lion Hearted’ and addresses both physical and emotional issues of the heart. We made the Borage Flower Essence in this elixir on a sunny day and the bees were busily tending it, but let us make off with a handful of flowers to make some medicine. Borage will bring you courage to allow your soul to be buoyant, and will work to help you improve your outlook on your life. That pure blue color of the petals is transcendent! We also included Bleeding Heart flower essence to help you invite love into your heart, fully and without the inhibitions perhaps caused by previous experiences. This elixir addresses the heart on a physical, spiritual and emotional plane. Enjoy.
4oz bottle.

name: Fire Cider
description:
A fiery immune and circulatory system support! Start the day off right with a boost of energy from this combination of apple cider vinegar, ginger, onions, garlic, horseradish and a blend of other spicy herbs. The apple cider vinegar is always an ally to make our bodies a healthier alkaline environment. We bury the jars of fire cider in the earth for about a month before straining and bottling so they are extra potent! You can take shots of this straight, dilute it with some honey or use it as a salad dressing. Shake well and refrigerate after opening to better preserve.
4oz bottle.


***The information here is for educational purposes only. None of the above statements have been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.***

name: Elderberry Elixir
description:
A combination of elderberries, rosehips, asian pear, brandy, cinnamon and honey. This Elixir single handedly kept us from getting sick last Autumn and Winter. The immune support that you get from elderberries is unparalleled. Extra Vitamin C is provided from the Rosehips and Asian Pear soothes any cough that might pop up. Cinnamon gets it all circulating and helps warm the body.  A combination of elderberries, rosehips, asian pear, brandy, cinnamon and honey. This Elixir single handedly kept us from getting sick last Autumn and Winter. The immune support that you get from elderberries is unparalleled. Extra Vitamin C is provided from the rosehips, and asian pear soothes any cough that might pop up. Cinnamon gets it all circulating and helps warm the body. Take a tbsp. as needed, we have been known to take a tablespoon every couple of hours to avoid catching a cold or flu. We also love adding this Elixir to hot toddies with some freshly grated ginger. 
4oz bottle.

name: Mullein + Thyme Herbal Extract
description:
This is our extract to honor the properties of Metal in Traditional Chinese Medicine, and the health of your lungs. This herbal extract will help you muster through all the challenges your lungs face in Autumn and Winter. It is very effective, especially for back to school coughs and sore throats. We used the beautiful silvery leaves of mullein which have traditionally been used to help tonify the lungs. Thyme is utilized for it’s aromatic and antibacterial properties. This tasty extract can be used daily at 15-30 drops three times a day, can dilute in water or tea if you prefer. 
1oz bottle.

name: Summer Calm herbal extract
description: Our motivation for this Extract includes those perfect still moments of summer. Right now as I’m writing this I’m picturing waking up early while on a camping trip and walking down to the lake. The water is still, the birds are already busy and a few fish are jumping. The air smells sweet and cool and there is a feeling of all the potential the day has. This is what this extract can bring you – calmness of the spirit, insight into the potential of your experiences and a sense of the natural pace of life. Pedicularis is a beautiful native plant that is a skeletal muscle relaxant taken in larger direct doses. We are blending it into this extract to serve as an aid in releasing muscle tension in your body that has been built up by stress. Let Pedicularis help move those shoulders down a few inches! CA Poppy in all of its cheery bright orange is a powerful nervine and is amazing at calming any anxiety you may be having.  Elie harvested these Oat Tops while on a beautiful farm in Northern California while they were in their milky stage, meaning that when the tops are pressed together a milk like substance can be seen. When tinctured fresh in this stage it is powerful medicine for adrenal and nervous system exhaustion.  This medicine is food for your nervous system. And lastly we added Apple Blossom Flower Essence carrying over a little Spring medicine into the Summer Share. Simply standing under an apple tree in bloom can lift your heart, and we are using this essence with the intention of aiding you in welcoming new dreams and aspirations into your life. Summer is about pure potential and this essence will help you clarify where your adventures might lead you.

name: Ocotillo + Rose Quartz Essence
description:
This essence will help you to keep an open loving heart while maintaining clear boundaries. Rose Quartz is pure heart medicine, while Ocotillo and Yarrow help support us to have healthy boundaries, and in that sense help further enable us to open our hearts and to feel grounded and secure.  This essence is particularly effective for people who are especially sensitive to the moods and energy of the people around them. It will help you to maintain your own sense of self and feel grounded while doing so. Who doesn’t need a little help with that? We’d like to thank Karyn Sanders of Blue Otter Herb School for her teachings about Ocotillo being a kind of psychic barbed wire. It’s a powerful remedy we turn to time and time again. Take 1-3 drops under the tongue, or in water as needed.
1oz bottle.

name: Queen Anne's Lace + Black Tourmaline Essence
description:
Autumn is a time of year where the veils between the worlds are thin. This essence will help you to open up into the further reaches of your psyche and intuitive self. Queen Anne's Lace supports your innate psychic capabilities, while Tourmaline gives you firm, grounded boundaries on this journey. We made the Tourmaline Essence under the Perseid Meteor Shower for some extra celestial power. Flower essences are versatile in their use; you can put a few drops directly on your tongue, add a few drops to a glass of water or add a half dropper or so to a spritzer bottle for a room spray. Set your intentions before taking. 
1oz bottle.

name: All Purpose Salve
description: Whether it’s from gardening, camping or getting ensnared by blackberry tendrils it’s easy to wind up with some scratches, irritated skin, scrapes and bug bites. While it’s totally worth it, there’s no reason you can’t have a little relief. This salve is in an easy to carry tin that’s perfect to bring along with you on your adventures. Calendula petals and Comfrey leaves have a long standing tradition of bringing relief and speedy healing to the skin. We added a little Oregon Grape Root for anti-bacterial purposes and some Lavender Essential Oil for it’s anti-fungal and antiseptic properties. The Olive Oil base will soothe weathered skin. This salve will melt if exposed to high temperatures so it’s best not to leave it in a hot vehicle or in bright sun or you’ll have a potential mess on your hands!

name: Relieve Liniment
description:
This liniment is perfect for overworked muscles. A combination of local plants, essential oils, flower essences and a time honored martial arts recipe. Perfect for gardeners, runners, dancers, makers and anyone who loves to move so much that they can tend to overdo it sometimes. Easy to use, spray onto affected area and massage into muscles. Can apply up to 3 times daily. We've had countless testimonies as to how well this works!
2oz glass bottle

name: Restore Liniment
description:
This liniment is a perfect external rub for chronic (long term) aches and pains. It is based on a time honored martial arts recipe written about by Tom Bisio. We've taken this combination of herbs used in Traditional Chinese Medicine and added our local Cottonwood Bud which has powerful pain relieving qualities. We've also added essential oils to further increase circulation to the affected area(s), and flower essences to help you deal with the effects around dealing with chronic pain issues. Think of our Restore Liniment when you are dealing with old stubborn injuries, repetitive stress injuries and aches and pains that reappear with the weather. Kristen has used this with continual good feedback from her acupuncture clients. 
2oz bottle with spray top.

name: Mineral Salt Soaks
description:
Our salt soaks combine Pacific sea salt with other mineral rich salts and steam distilled essential oils. They are deeply relaxing and soothing to the skin. Choose from the following Elements line.
8oz glass jar

D E S E R T soak blends the calming essential oils of Lavender, Ylang Ylang & Sage to bring the sacred beauty of the desert into your heart.

F O R E S T soak blends the grounding essential oils of Cedarwood, Fir & Vetiver to take you down the trails of an ancient, towering forest. 

S E A  soak blends the uplifting essential oils of Eucalyptus, Bay & Lemongrass to instill brightness and clarity. 

M O U N T A I N soak blends the purifying essential oils of Juniper, Myrrh & Rosemary to help you feel as strong and still as a mountain.

name: Rose Petal + Lavender Facial Toner
description: Inspired by Queen of Hungary Water we created a garden variety Facial Toner to help soothe your skin and refresh your skin. We steeped lavender, calendula, comfrey, rose petals and huckleberry leaves in Witch Hazel to draw out the healing properties of all of these  wonderful plants and added a little Lavender Hydrosol. This toner is light and simple and carries just a light scent of roses and lavender.

name: Sea Soap
description:
E u c a l y p t u s + S e a w e e d

An invigorating blend of essential oils, sea salt to exfoliate & seaweed to help hydrate the skin. All of our soaps are made in the traditional cold process method using olive, coconut and palm oil as the base. High quality essential oils are added to provide aromatherapeutic properties to each blend. Organic herbal infused oils are used to create healing and nourishing qualities to our soap, making it rich in lather and mild for sensitive skin. The soap is hand cut and air cured for at least 4 weeks. Keep soap dry between each use to help it last as long as possible.

name: Desert Soap
description:
Y l a n g Y l a n g  +  S a g e 

A calming blend of essential oils, blue cornmeal & red clay leave the skin soft and mind relaxed. All of our soaps are made in the traditional cold process method using olive, coconut and palm oil as the base. High quality essential oils are added to provide aromatherapeutic properties to each blend. Herbal infused oils are used to create healing and nourishing qualities to our soap, making it rich in lather and mild for sensitive skin. The soap is hand cut and air cured for at least 4 weeks. Keep soap dry between each use to help it last as long as possible.
Bars weigh around and about 3.5oz

name: Forest Soap
description:
C e d a r w o o d  +  V e t i v e r

A grounding blend of essential oils is used in this deeply cleansing bar. Green clay is added to help draw out impurities, leaving the pores clean and moisturized. All of our soaps are made in the traditional cold process method using olive, coconut and palm oil as the base. High quality essential oils are added to provide aromatherapeutic properties to each blend. Herbal infused oils are used to create healing and nourishing qualities to our soap, making it rich in lather and mild for sensitive skin. The soap is hand cut and air cured for at least 4 weeks. Keep soap dry between each use to help it last as long as possible.
Bars weigh around and about 3.5oz

name: Mountain Soap
description:
J u n i p e r + R o s e m a r y 

 Long used for its protective & detoxifying qualities, juniper is blended with rosemary and fennel in this handsome soap. Activated charcoal and crushed walnut husks are added to further purge the body of impurities and wash away dirt and oils, while toning the skin. All of our soaps are made in the traditional cold process method using olive, coconut and palm oil as the base. High quality essential oils are added to provide aromatherapeutic properties to each blend. Herbal infused oils are used to create healing and nourishing qualities to our soap, making it rich in lather and mild for sensitive skin. The soap is hand cut and air cured for at least 4 weeks. Keep soap dry between each use to help it last as long as possible.
Bars weigh around and about 3.5oz

name: 2014 Tea Towel Calender
description:
We're so delighted to offer this 2014 tea towel calendar made by local artist (and our friend and studio mate!) Julianna Bright. 2014's design was hand-lettered and inked with pen and brush. Julianna then passed it along to the lovely McPherson sisters at Little Red Press here in Portland where the calendars were hand screened with water based ink on organic cotton, flour sack towels. 

Inspired by Hungarian and Pennsylvania Dutch folk art. Hang it on your wall for all of 2014, then toss it amongst your kitchen towels when the year expires.

Please specify if you would like it in bleached or unbleached cotton. 28 x 29"

name: Limited Edition Zodiac Prints by Fortress Letterpress
description: Four 5x7 letterpress prints of the Summer or Autumn constellations come in a gorgeous printed envelope showing all four constellations rotation around the sun. Summer includes Gemini, Cancer, Leo and Virgo. The Autumn set includes Virgo, Libra, Scorpio and Sagittarius. Bruce created this series for our Summer and Autumn CSH Share to further highlight the importance of nature on our collective and individual health. We are happy to offer a few of these limited edition series for you to enjoy. Please choose Summer or Autumn prints when ordering.

name: Spring CSH Share
description:
Our Spring Share is sold out! Thank you for your support! The Summer CSH Share is now available.

Spring // Liver & Gallbladder // Green // Wood // Tendons

Spring is a time where energy starts to move again. Sap starts to rise in the trees, seeds burst through the earth and buds line the trees. It is a time to come out of the restive nature of winter and begin to move outward again. 

Our Spring Share will focus on supporting the Liver & Gallbladder in their work of spring cleaning after a long winter, readying the body & mind for Spring and preparing you for awakening from the depths of Winter's slumber. Local Share Members enter LOCAL to avoid shipping costs! 

This Share will include: 

** Spring Tonic Vinegar with mineral rich herbs like Parsley, Horsetail, Nettles & Dandelion. 

** Liniment for overworked muscles. A combination of local plants, essential oils, flower essences and a time honored martial arts recipe. Spring is associated with the tendons and as you begin to become more active this will be perfect to have on hand. Especially for you gardeners!

** Nutritive Tea with Nettles, Oat straw, Dandelion, Lemon Balm and Violet leaf. A blend of minerals and rich in Vitamin C.  This tea will have citrus notes blended with the intense green of Spring. 

** Wild Rose, White Peony & Hawthorne Flower Elixir will help to open your heart and calm your nerves. Even just picturing those three beautiful blooms together makes us feel better!

** Forest Soap with Cedar and Vetiver. A Portland Apothecary favorite.

** Detoxifying Salt Scrub with Geranium & Grapefruit, Sea Salts and Clay. It's time to move that lymphatic system and slough off those old cells. It is the Year of the Snake after all. 

** Liver Supporting tincture to help process fats, take the edge off of any brittle emotions and support your body to function at it's best. 

** Spring Equinox Mister with flower essences and essential oils to support your moving from Winter Dreams to Springtime Fruition. 

***Because it is after our Share Pick Up date we are mailing out all Shares at this point, even if you are local. We don't have a storefront so scheduling pick up times with so many variables has been too difficult. Thank you for your understanding.

name: Summer CSH Share
description:
South / Fire / Heart / Red / Circulation / Joy / Bitter Foods / Laughter/ Ultimate Yang

Long days at the lake with a picnic. Hikes to secret river spots. Picking wild berries until your fingers are stained. Sigh. Summer. Our Summer CSH Share will focus on these pure feelings of the season. Some remedies will cool down your system, others will calm weathered skin; we'll focus on promoting circulation, while at the same time including some remedies to help you wind down to the pace of summer.  Some of the following remedies may change a bit, but for now here are the beauties in our Summer Share 2013: 

** Blossom Tea: Linden Flowers, Rose Petals, Chamomile, Lemon Balm and hibiscus. This is a perfect blend for a sun infused tea that will help cool you down and bring calm into your heart. A beautiful and amazing smelling blend. 

**Basil & Citrus Sugar Scrub: Keep your skin looking and feeling great with this rejuvenating blend. Good circulation is an important part of skin care and by using this scrub in a circular motion towards the heart it helps not only with your circulation, but also with lymphatic flow. A great and invigorating way to wake up in the morning. 

**Pedicularis & California Poppy Extract: These two herbs will help you unwind and settle into the warm nights and long days of summer. Flower Essence blends will also be included to help ensure ultimate relaxation. This extract will make you feel like you just had the most perfect summer day.

**Rose, Calendula & Huckleberry Leaf Facial Toner. A reparative and gently astringent formula to balance and tone the skin. Pure lavender flower hydrosol is added for aromatherapeutic benefits and overall skin radiance. This toner is especially refreshing when kept in the refrigerator and soothing after a day in the sun. 

**Douglas Fir Tip Infused Salt: The majestic beauty of Douglas Fir surrounds us here in the Pacific Northwest and its tips have a unique citrus flavor packed with Vitamin C. This salt is meant for pure enjoyment. Great on freshly picked heirloom tomatoes, as a finishing salt for grilled veggies or even on your watermelon slices. So good. 

**Schizandra & Hawthorne Berry Elixir: Berries, honey and brandy are a favorite combination around here. Especially when they are as nutritive as this combination. Schizandra berry has all 5 flavors represented in its taste and in Traditional Chinese Medicine is seen as an ultimate tonic. Hawthorne Berry has a long standing tradition of being used as a heart tonic, both physically and emotionally. Some Flower Essences will appear in this elixir as well. Right now we're thinking a borage flower essence made under the full moon for a little courage.

**Desert Soap: Ylang Ylang and Desert Sage transport you to the cooling air of the desert at night. Cold processed and moisturizing this soap has blue cornmeal to exfoliate and red clay to help detoxify and nourish the skin. 

**All Purpose Salve with Comfrey & Calendula: for all kinds of summer scrapes, cuts, bug bites and rashes. 

**Limited edition letterpress prints of the summer zodiac constellations by Fortress Letterpress. Individual 5x7 stunning prints. 

If you are a local Portland resident and can commit to either coming to the Share pick up or having a friend pick your share up for you, please enter the code LOCAL to avoid shipping costs! ** This code applies to CSH Shares only and not individual products unless you want them added to your share, thanks! **

Disclaimer: In purchasing this CSH share you do so understanding that the information provided in this share is for informational purposes only and is not intended as a substitute for advice from your physician or other health care professional. You should not use the information in this CSH share for self-diagnosis or to replace any prescriptive medication. You should consult with a health care professional before starting any diet, exercise or supplementation program, before taking any medication, or if you have or suspect you might have a health problem, suffer from allergies, are pregnant or nursing. 

Thank you, we are so excited to begin another CSH Share! And, can you tell? We adore Summer.

All the best, 
Elie and Kristen

name: Autumn CSH Share
description:
West / Metal / White / Lungs 

***** We have added another round of our CSH Shares after selling out of the first round! These shares will be sent out a little later, the week of October 7th.*****UPDATE! All of our Autumn Shares are sold out, thank you! 

Also if you would like to be notified when the Winter CSH Share becomes available please go to our website under contact, and sign up for our mailing list, alternately you could follow us on Facebook or Instagram where we also will announce! Again, Thank YOU! *******

The air has a slight chill to it, and the sun is hitting the earth at a slightly different angle. The spiders are spinning their webs and the winter squashes are ripening. All of these are reminders that we are leaving the warmth of Summer and moving into the time of longer nights and a change in the weather. The air is crisp and the veils between the worlds grow thinner, it's a great time to focus on some preventative health measures to ensure that you are fortified and ready to face the oncoming Winter. We give careful consideration to the physical and emotional demands of the season both in curating and making your Autumn Shares. 

CSH Shares are available for preorder and will ship out or be available for local pick around the Autumn Equinox. The following remedies are included in your full Autumn CSH Share: 

>>Elderberry Elixir: A combination of elderberries, rosehips, asian pear, brandy, cinnamon and honey. This Elixir single handedly kept us from getting sick last Autumn and Winter. The immune support that you get from elderberries is unparalleled. Extra Vitamin C is provided from the Rosehips and Asian Pear soothes any cough that might pop up. Cinnamon gets it all circulating and helps warm the body. 4oz amber round. 

>>>Fire Cider: A fiery immune and circulatory system support! Start the day off right with a boost of energy from this combination of apple cider vinegar, ginger, onions, garlic, horseradish and a blend of other spicy herbs. We bury the jars of fire cider in the earth for about a month before straining and bottling so they are extra potent! 4oz amber round

>>>>>>Hyssop & Yarrow Flower Tea: A blend of tasty and medicinal herbs to take when you feel a fever coming on, or the beginnings of a cold or flu. Perfect to take between getting out of a hot bat and getting under the covers. Will help you sweat it out! 

>>>Elecampane Honey: This is such a special honey, ask anyone who signed up for last Autumn's Share! The deep earthy taste of elecampane root mixed with local Willamette Valley honey is amazingly delicious. It's also extremely effective at warding off respiratory and bronchial ailments, especially those that are productive. And, it comes in a cute reusable Weck jar. 

>>>Queen Anne's Lace & Tourmaline Flower Essence: Autumn is a time of year where the veils between the worlds are thin. This flower essence will help ground you into the earth to enable you to open up into the further reaches of your psyche. Queen Anne's Lace will help support your innate psychic capabilities, while Tourmaline will help give you firm boundaries to make sure it's a good ride! We are making the Tourmaline Essence under the Perseid Meteor Showers for some extra added celestial power. 1oz Amber Round. 

>>>Mountain Salt Soak: It's time to get back into that bathtub of yours! Let the grounding and protective properties of Juniper, Myrrh and Fennel transport you to those special moments you've had looking out over a mountainous vista. A combination of revitalizing salts and pure essential oils. 

>>>Mullein & Thyme Extract: Our extract honoring the properties of Metal and the health of your lungs. This extract will help you muster through all the challenges your lungs face in Autumn. Very effective especially for those back to school coughs and sore throats. 

>>>Mountain Soap: Juniper//Rosemary//Fennel: Long used for its protective & detoxifying qualities, wildcrafted juniper is blended with rosemary and fennel in this handsome soap. Activated charcoal and crushed walnut husks are added to further purge the body of impurities and wash away dirt and oils, while toning the skin. All of our soaps are made in the traditional cold process method using olive, coconut and palm oil as the base. High quality essential oils are added to provide aromatherapeutic properties to each blend. The soap is hand cut and air cured for at least 4 weeks. Keep soap dry between each use to help it last as long as possible.

>>>Astragalus Bundles: Muslin bags of Astragalus Root. Astragalus Root is a superb tonic for your immune system, and an easy way to get it into your diet is to throw a few sticks into your soups, stocks, rice water, etc when you are beginning to cook your warming foods for Autumn. 

>>>>>>>A few housekeeping notes: 

>>>If you are in Portland and plan on picking up your share at our local pick up enter the code LOCAL to avoid shipping costs. The pick up will be the week of Oct 7th. 

>>>Disclaimer: In purchasing this CSH share you do so understanding that the information provided in this share is for informational purposes only and is not intended as a substitute for advice from your physician or other health care professional. You should not use the information in this CSH share for self-diagnosis or to replace any prescriptive medication. You should consult with a health care professional before starting any diet, exercise or supplementation program, before taking any medication, or if you have or suspect you might have a health problem, suffer from allergies, are pregnant or nursing. 

We're so excited to offer this additional round of  CSH Shares!!!!

name: Autumn CSH Half Share
description:
***** We are sold out of our Autumn Half Shares! Thank you for your support! Winter Half Shares will be available for preorder in November. We will announce on Facebook, Instagram and on our Mailchimp newsletter that you can sign up for under the Contact Page of our website: portlandapothecary.com

For the first time we are offering a limited quantity half share option for this season's Community Supported Herbalism (CSH) Share. The half share is stripped down to medicinal essentials for preventative health care during Autumn. It's such an important transitional season to start off right to ensure a healthy descent into Winter. Half Shares are available now for preorder but will be shipped or available for local pick up around the Autumn Equinox.

Included in our half share are the following remedies:

>>>Elderberry Elixir: A combination of elderberries, rosehips, asian pear, brandy, cinnamon and honey. This Elixir single handedly kept us from getting sick last Autumn and Winter. The immune support that you get from elderberries is unparalleled. Extra Vitamin C is provided from the Rosehips and Asian Pear soothes any cough that might pop up. Cinnamon gets it all circulating and helps warm the body. 4oz amber round. 

>>>Fire Cider: A fiery immune and circulatory system support! Start the day off right with a boost of energy from this combination of apple cider vinegar, ginger, onions, garlic, horseradish and a blend of other spicy herbs. We bury the jars of fire cider in the earth for about a month before straining and bottling so they are extra potent! 4oz amber round

>>>Hyssop & Yarrow Flower Tea: A blend of tasty and medicinal herbs to take when you feel a fever coming on, or the beginnings of a cold or flu. Perfect to take between getting out of a hot bat and getting under the covers. Will help you sweat it out! 

>>>Queen Anne's Lace & Tourmaline Flower Essence: Autumn is a time of year where the veils between the worlds are thin. This flower essence will help ground you into the earth to enable you to open up into the further reaches of your psyche. Queen Anne's Lace will help support your innate psychic capabilities, while Tourmaline will help give you firm boundaries to make sure it's a good ride! We are making the Tourmaline Essence under the Perseid Meteor Showers for some extra added celestial power. 1oz Amber Round. 

Each half share will come with our Autumn Notes which include sound advice for how to best transition with the seasons, including the physical, emotional and spiritual realms. We will also include more lengthy notes on each remedy and their indications of use. 

Unfortunately at this time we are unable to offer substitutions from the full share, the remedies in this half share have been carefully thought out and we think you'll enjoy them. 

A few housekeeping notes: 

>>>If you are in Portland and plan on picking up your share at our local pick up enter the code LOCAL to avoid shipping costs. The pick up will be Friday evening September 20th. If you know you cannot make this date please do have it shipped!

>>>Disclaimer: In purchasing this CSM share you do so understanding that the information provided in this share is for informational purposes only and is not intended as a substitute for advice from your physician or other health care professional. You should not use the information in this CSM share for self-diagnosis or to replace any prescriptive medication. You should consult with a health care professional before starting any diet, exercise or supplementation program, before taking any medication, or if you have or suspect you might have a health problem, suffer from allergies, are pregnant or nursing. 

We're so excited to offer these half shares!!!!
